summary: This document consists of three daily lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering the evening of July 5, 2019, through the day of July 6, 2019. The logs detail routine prison operations, counts, and inmate movements. A key entry notes the arrival of inmate Jeffrey Epstein to the facility on the evening of July 5, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054, who was moved to unit 5N at 9:27 PM on July 5, 2019, as per the Evening Watch log.

persons.name: Burnett
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76254-054, who was at a local hospital with USMS guards at 12:39 AM on July 6, 2019, as per the Morning Watch log.

persons.name: Johnson
persons.context: Listed as inmate #50972-054, who was removed from KN to ZA at 9:15 AM on July 6, 2019, and placed in Administrative Detention for an SIS investigation, as per the Day Watch log.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Arrives at MCC
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was moved to unit 5N at the Metropolitan Correctional Center at 9:27 PM.

events.title: Inmate Johnson Placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: Inmate Johnson (#50972-054) was removed from unit KN to ZA and placed in Administrative Detention due to an SIS investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein, as inmate #76318-054, was logged as arriving at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York at 9:27 PM on July 5, 2019.
The logs show routine prison operations, including multiple inmate counts, equipment checks, and the monitoring of an inmate (Burnett) at a local hospital with US Marshals Service (USMS) guards.
Another inmate, Johnson, was placed in Administrative Detention on July 6, 2019, for an SIS (Special Investigative Services) investigation.
The document provides a detailed administrative record of the MCC's operations in the days immediately following Epstein's arrest.
